mapper.select: SELECT * FROM zd_rent_period_price WHERE foregift_id = #{foregiftId} and battery_type = #{batteryType} and agent_id = #{agentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zd_rent_period_price( agent_id, agent_name, agent_code, foregift_id, battery_type, day_count, price, memo, create_time ) VALUES ( #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{agentCode}, #{foregiftId}, #{batteryType}, #{dayCount}, #{price}, #{memo}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update zd_rent_period_price SET agent_name = #{agentName}, agent_code = #{agentCode}, day_count = #{dayCount}, price = #{price}, memo = #{memo} where id = #{id}
